00062 void Rule::copy(const Rule &other)
00063 {

00065     r_left_symbol    = other.get_left_symbol();
00066     r_right_side     = other.get_right_side();

00121 const Equation *Rule::get_eq(const unsigned short index) const
00122 {
00123     map<unsigned short, Equation>::const_iterator it(r_eqs.find(index));
00124     if(it == r_eqs.end())
00125     {
00126         return NULL;
00127     }
00128     else
00129     {
00130         return &(it->second);
00131     }
00132 }

00161 const bool Rule::defined_equation(const Equation &eq) const
00162 {
00163     for(map<unsigned short,Equation>::const_iterator it(r_eqs.begin()); it != r_eqs.end(); it++)
00164     {
00165         if (it->second.get_l_value()->equals(eq.get_l_value()))
00166         {
00167             return true;
00168         }
00169     }
00170     return false;
00171 }
00172 
00176 const bool Rule::belongs_non_terminal(const Symbol &non_term) const
00177 {
00178     if(non_term.equals(*r_left_symbol))
00179     {
00180         return true;
00181     }
00182     for(vector<const Symbol*>::size_type i(0); i < r_right_side.size(); i++)
00183     {
00184         if (non_term.equals(*r_right_side.at(i)))
00185         {
00186             return true;
00187         }
00188     }
00189     return false;
00190 }
00191 
00195 const bool Rule::add_eq(Equation &eq)
00196 {
00197     static unsigned short id_eq(1);
00198 
00199     if (defined_equation(eq))
00200     {
00201         /* The equation is already defined then it isn't inserted.
00202          * The map does not accept the overhead of the equations.
00203          */
00204         return false;
00205     }
00206     eq.set_id(id_eq);
00207 
00208     pair<unsigned short,Equation> new_eq(id_eq++, eq);
00209     pair<map<unsigned short, Equation>::iterator, bool > result(r_eqs.insert(new_eq));
00210 
00211     /* Update de offset of the rule */
00212     r_offset = id_eq - get_number_eqs();
00213     assert(result.second);
00214     return true;
00215 }

00229 const string Rule::to_string() const
00230 {
00231     string rule(to_string_not_eqs());
00232     if(!r_eqs.empty())
00233     /* If r_eqs is empty not show it the compute's block. */
00234     {
00235         rule.append("\n            compute\n");
00236         for(map<unsigned short,Equation>::const_iterator it(r_eqs.begin()); it != r_eqs.end(); it++)
00237         {
00238             rule.append("                ");
00239             rule.append(it->second.to_string());
00240             rule.append("\n");
00241         }
00242         rule.append("            end");
00243     }
00244     rule.append(";\n");
00245     return rule;
00246 }

00255 const string Rule::to_string_not_eqs() const
00256 {
00257     string rule("/*R");
00258 
00259     stringstream key_rule;
00260     key_rule << r_id;
00261     rule.append(key_rule.str());
00262 
00263     rule.append("*/ ");
00264 
00265     rule.append(r_left_symbol->get_name());
00266     rule.append(" ::= ");
00267     for(vector<const Symbol*>::size_type i(0); i < r_right_side.size(); i++)
00268     {
00269         rule.append(r_right_side[i]->get_name());
00270         if(i+1 < r_right_side.size())
00271         {
00272             rule.append(" ");
00273         }
00274     }
00275     return rule;
00276 }

00281 const bool Rule::equals(const Rule &other) const
00282 {
00283     if(r_left_symbol->equals(*(other.get_left_symbol())))
00284     {
00285         if (r_right_side.size() != other.get_right_side().size())
00286         {
00287                 return false;
00288         }
00289 
00290         for(size_t i(0); i < r_right_side.size(); i++)
00291         {
00292             if (!r_right_side[i]->equals(*(other.get_right_side()[i])))
00293             {
00294                 return false;
00295             }
00296         }
00297         return true;
00298     }
00299     else
00300     {
00301         return false;
00302     }
00303 }

00318 const int Rule::count_non_terminal(const Symbol *symb) const
00319 {
00320     int count(0);
00321     if(symb->equals(*r_left_symbol))
00322     {
00323         count++;
00324     }
00325     for(vector<const Symbol*>::size_type i(0); i < r_right_side.size(); i++)
00326     {
00327         if (r_right_side[i]->is_non_terminal() && symb->equals(*r_right_side[i]))
00328         {
00329             count++;
00330         }
00331     }
00332     return count;
00333 }
00334 
00338 const vector<const Symbol*> Rule::get_non_terminals_right_side() const
00339 {
00340     vector<const Symbol*> result;
00341     for(size_t i(0); i < r_right_side.size(); i++)
00342     {
00343         if (r_right_side[i]->is_non_terminal())
00344         {
00345             result.push_back(r_right_side[i]);
00346         }
00347     }
00348     return result;
00349 }
